documents.document:
Green Tea May Strengthen Your Teeth

A cup of green tea a day may keep the dentist away.
That's the finding of new research published in Preventive Medicine. The findings show that drinking at least one cup of green tea a day increases the odds of[nickname] keeping your teeth as you age[/nickname].
The researchers suspect that antimicrobial molecules called catechins present in green tea and in lesser amounts in oolong tea provide the benefit. But be careful if you like your tea with sugar: sweetener may negate the effect, the team found.
"Green tea may have bacteriocidal effects, which would affect teeth, but only if you drink it without sugar," said Alfredo Morabia, of Columbia University in New York and editor of Preventive Medicine, who wrote an editorial accompanying the new research.
"They also reported that drinking sweet coffee was actually deleterious," he added. "Coffee alone had no problem, but sweet coffee would actually make you lose your teeth."

Let us experience the beach

The range of mens beach shorts made from the best quality fabric makes the trip to the beach relaxing. Available in a number of sizes these have become hot selling products among beach lovers. The shorts for men are designed keeping in view comfort, and ease. Easy wearing is permitted by full elastic waist heavy-duty drawcord side pockets and back pocket. The comfortable loose fitting shorts beam with excitement in style and color.
These beach shorts are available in rainbow of colors. The shorts are either single color shorts or double colored shots. Check shorts and printed are also prevalent among the large section of the people. However mostly the bright colored shorts are more preferred by the beach goers.
If you want to find the beach feeling is put on mens beach shorts.

Cut this cake in half

Dick was seven years old, and his sister, Catherine, was five.
One day their mother took them to their aunt's house to play while
she went to the big city to buy some new clothes.

The children played for an hour, and then at half past four their
aunt took Dick into the kitchen. She gave him a nice cake and a knife
and said to him, "Now here's a knife, Dick. Cut this cake in half and
give one of the pieces to your sister, but remember to do it like a gentleman."

"Like a gentleman?" Dick asked. "How do gentlemen do it?"
http://sarach.tabulas.com/2010/09/16/nest-and-hair/
They always give the bigger piece to the other person."
answered his aunt at once.

"Oh" said Dick. He thought about this for a few seconds.
Then he took the cake to his sister and said to her,"Cut this cake in half, Catherine.".

Miss you

10 years old birthday, grandma gave me a silver necklace, I like it very much, everyday wear, bath is wearing, sleeping of time also wear. But in my junior high school of time, The school forbid us to wear any gold and silver jewelry, so I took it down, I hid it in a closet, but also locked. But one day, prepare the necklace to dormitory, surprise, I can't find it anywhere, I was worried, I looked everywhere. But I couldn't find it, I was very sad, this is grandma gave me the birthday gift, I always cherish it, and now it's gonehttp://www.fiql.com/blogs/yage/

Weding poems

It's a wedding! For the bride and groom, it should be one of the most romantic and meaningful days of their lives.
Opting for romantic wedding invitation poems is a sweet, touching way to share your excitement and love with everyone on your guest list. Use these ideas to get started.
"My life began the day I met you
And I vow to never let you go
Together we'll travel through life
A love to have and to hold
Today I marry my friend
With a passion I hold so true
My life is full and joyous
For the moments I share with you"http://www.ebuyg.com
If you're not feeling creative, you can always borrow a line from a famous poem. "How do I love thee?" is a popular example, although only you can really count the ways!
Get Personal
The best wedding invitation poems can only be written by you!
If you can pull together the best parts of your relationship and put them to words, then your elegant wedding invitations will truly be a memorable part of your big day.
Anyone can fill in the blanks for an ordinary invitation, but only you can make yours really come alive with a poem!

Why are girls's T-shirts so short?

Question:
Almost every T-shirts I come across in the UK is too short... not all of us want to show the world our stomachs at every given opportunity! Why can't they make T-shirts longer? I can't be the only one who feels like this?
http://www.ebuyg.com
Answer:
Today, girl’s T-Shirts are short because of the fashion trend nowadays. And the short T-shirts is another beautiful and fashionable style for the youth. It is not only the cool in summer, but also showing the good figure of girls. Maybe your ideal style is quite different from them, and so be unique.

This is the handbag for you

• If you are short and round choose a tall, rectangular tote with long straps or a long sleek, structured clutch.
• If you are pear shaped choose a structured cigar box purse or a sleek rectangular Kelly bag.
• If you are large busted stir clear of close-fitting handbags, which rest under the arm (this will further enlarge your bust and feel cramped), instead opt for a purse with long shoulder straps.
• If you are tall and thin choose a slouchy designer hobo bag, rounded bag or half-moon shaped purse.
• If you are very petit Stay away from extremely large bags, but choose a long clutch or rectangular tote that hits your leg and give the appearance of elongation.
• If you have a slim waist choose a designer purse with shoulder straps that allow the bottom of the bag to hit your waist.
• If you are 6-feet tall avoid cute, miniature evening bags or mini handheld pouches that you overwhelm with your stature.
• If you want to accentuate cleavage - pick a close fitting bag with short straps, which lie right under your armpit.
http://www.ebuyg.com

Autumn has come

When the weather is chilly, you don't want to wear your regular shoes. Women's boots will give you the warmth and protection you need. With all of the styles available, these wintry-day shoes can also keep you in fashion. For the women's boots you need to stay warm and for the women's boots you need to stay in fashion, Our large selection of women's shoes is sure to include women's boots you'll love to wear.

Women's boots can add serious fashion to your look. Whether you like flat styles, heels or booties, fall and winter clothing looks great with women's boots. The versatility of this footwear will keep you looking great no matter what you wear with them. Wear fitted styles with knee-length skirts or wear tall fits, including high black women's boots, with miniskirts. Tuck your skinny jeans into your women's boots or let your pant legs cover all but the toes. Black ankle styles also look great with skinny jeans and leggings. You have so many options with boots that you may forget about all of your other shoes -- at least until spring.
http://www.ebuyg.com

Wearing different clothes in different occasions

Attend a formal occasions, such as formal meeting, banquet, conference, marriage funeral, evening in a dark suit social activities must wear white shirts requirements, wearing a shirt, tie request rules or design pattern of tie, color contrast shoulds not be too strong.

Half a formal occasions, such as attendance at work, and general access, senior luncheon meeting held a grand and during activity, can wear medium color, light color or more lively, can wear dark suit plain and neat, elegant color coordination with suit wearing a shirt, or the simple rules of decorative pattern color tie.

At informal situations, such as tourism, visiting friends, wearing can literally free, can choose tonal anacreontic and leisure clothing, shirt, tie can be arbitrary collocation can free collocation.

In addition, suit and gets the use of buttons is a learned. Generally speaking, suit jacket into double-breasted with two buttons. Wear double-breasted coat generally will all button button, sometimes can be a real below. Buttons can be a real mounted below, not all or all buttons will not buckled. Most often gets: real one button below. If the firm tie, should be placed inside the vest, pointed. Don't tie On formal occasions should wear a three-piece suit or two times, avoid and wear woolen vest or sweater.
